original_text: In the number of all the males, from a month old and upward, were eight thousand and six hundred, keeping the charge of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 계수된 자로서 출생 후 일 개월 이상 된 남자는 모두 팔천육백 명인데 성소를 맡을 것이며

sentences.original_text: In the number of all the males
from a month old and upward
were eight thousand and six hundred
keeping the charge of the sanctuary
